snippet: The new-music ensemble counter)induction presented far more abstract works before performing Schoenberg’s “Ode to Napoleon Buonaparte” on Sunday evening at Columbia University’s Casa Italiana.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance by new-music ensemble counter)induction, performing Schoenberg's Ode to Napoleon Buonaparte, at Columbia University's Casa Italiana.
lead_paragraph: The new-music ensemble counter)induction presented far more abstract works before performing Schoenberg’s “Ode to Napoleon Buonaparte” on Sunday evening at Columbia University’s Casa Italiana.

headline.main: All in the Framing: The Schoenberg That Isn’t Scary
headline.print_headline: All in the Framing: The Schoenberg That Isn’t Scary
